column5: Sorry if this is a redundant question, after searching I couldn't find anything...  may have an opportunity become the new owner of a used 700cc 4x4 ATV.  I was wondering if anyone give me a rough idea of what insurance would be on such a machine.  I'm in my late 30's, clean driving record and have also been an owner of a insured street bike for 8 years (if that would be a factor or not, I'm not sure).  Thanks!
I pay 300.00 for a Artic cat 650 cc.
I showed my wife your post. She said she can't insure you.
Huh??   Is she a broker, or with a company?
Call Nathan Ackland from State Farm in Brantford. He drives atv's and can get great prices. Google his name for the number.
i'm in my late 30's as well and pay 360 a year for my side by side rhino.
